baseRule.text: 若復苾芻尼知和合僧伽。如法斷諍事已除滅。後於羯磨處。更發舉者。波逸底迦。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 4

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṁ yathādhammaṁ nihatādhikaraṇaṁ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 63

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer die Wiederaufnahme eines Streitfalls betreibt, von dem er weiß, daß er der Regel gemäß entschieden wurde, muß dafür sühnen.
If a monk reopens a legal issue that he knows has been legitimately settled, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu, sabiéndolo, incita a revivir un tema que ya ha sido correctamente tratado [finalizado]: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。知僧如法斷事竟。還更發起。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 4

fullParallels.text: 若比丘知僧如法斷事已。還更發起。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 4

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻知和合僧伽如法斷諍事。已除滅後。於羯磨處更發舉者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 4

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。為女人說法過五六語。除有別知善惡語男子。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 4

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。知僧如法如律滅諍已。更發起言。此羯磨不了當更作。作是因緣不異。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 4

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！知諍事，如法懺悔已，後更發起者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 66

translations.text: If a monk, knowing that either of the four questions which cause difference has been settled according to law, shall afterwards stir up the matter for further discussion, it is Pācittiya.
66. Jika seorang bhikṣu mengungkit kembali perselisihan dalam perkumpulan (Saṅgha) meskipun ia tahu masalah itu telah diselesaikan sesuai dengan Dharma, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘知僧諍事起如法滅已。後更發舉者。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 66

fullParallels.text: 若比丘僧如法斷事後發起。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Pācittiya 4

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī jānaṁ yathādhammaṁ nihatādhikaraṇaṁ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 144

translations.text: Welche Nonne auch immer die Wiederaufnahme eines Streitfalls betreibt, von dem sie weiß, daß er der Regel gemäß entschieden wurde, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni knowingly agitate for the reviving of an issue that has been rightfully dealt with, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang dengan sadar menghasut untuk membangkitkan kembali suatu masalah yang telah di tangani dengan benar, itu harus di akui.
